description: Backend JWT Guard implementation depends on the AWS Cognito User Pool being provisioned.
mitigation_plan: DevOps to provide Cognito ARN and Pool ID to Backend team as soon as it's created.
impact_if_delayed: Entire backend authentication track will be blocked.

description: Backend data endpoints for user-specific data must be protected by the JWT guard.
mitigation_plan: Develop endpoints and guard in parallel within the same sprint.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks frontend from fetching user data post-login.

description: The custom mode execution API endpoint depends on the secure AWS Lambda function being deployed and tested.
mitigation_plan: Develop a mock Lambda function for the API to integrate against while the secure Lambda is being hardened.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire custom mode execution feature.

description: E2E testing for offline sync requires the full implementation of the sync logic.
mitigation_plan: QA to develop test cases in parallel with development. Use feature flags to merge and test incomplete logic in a staging environment.
impact_if_delayed: Inability to validate one of the highest-risk features of the application.
